Description: Blue glazed composition amuletic figure of Thoth as a squatting baboon; suspension ring at the top of the head.
Curator's comments: Published: Andrews, Amulets of Ancient Egypt (1994): p.27 Part of Sloane bequest, see Bierbrier, in Aegyptus Museis Redeviva (Fs De Meulenaere, 1993), 31 [751]
Exhibition history: 19th Nov 2011- 11 Mar 2012. Richmond , VA, Virginia museum of Fine Art. Mummy. The inside story. Mar - Oct 2012. Brisbane, Queensland Museum South Bank.
